is the pdf f(x) (Wasserman, 2004, chapter 2). For a random variable X
and a function U, we ﬁnd the pdf of the random variable Y := U(X) by
1. Finding the cdf:
FY(y) = P(Y ⩽y) (6.126)
2. Differentiating the cdf FY(y) to get the pdf f(y).
f(y) = d
dyFY(y) . (6.127)
